Behind the beautiful setting of a tourist town of the current Southeast Asia , we find , in a blockhouse , one filthy room and a bed with dirty sheets . Here, a little girl waits for the man who will then ... Alex ( Dermot Mulroney ) , a researcher of human trafficking , plays the role of his next customer , and thus negotiate with the pimp using the child . Claire ( Mira Sorvino ) , Alex's wife , in the midst of mourning the loss of his daughter , tries to rebuild his life in this nation of customs so different from yours. She then decides to volunteer at a shelter for victims of sexual abuse , where the freedom and dignity of a girl are threatened . Parallel stories intertwine into a dangerous and thrilling chase to rescue innocence stolen by underworld of human trafficking , in a story of struggle, hope and redemption.
